sentences.english: Betula ermanii and Alnus mandshurica predominated in the colonizing woody species on forest boundaries.
sentences.chinese: 林緣入侵物種主要由嶽樺和東北赤楊組成。

sentences.english: The microorganisms involved in symbiosis with the alder tree are actinomycetes of the genus Frankia.
sentences.chinese: 而與赤楊共生的微生物是放線菌。

sentences.english: At two a forest of oak and birch.
sentences.chinese: 下午過一座森林，黑橡與赤楊。

sentences.english: In the battle of the trees, the Alder fought in the very front line.
sentences.chinese: 在樹木的戰役中赤楊戰鬥在第一線。

sentences.english: Alder trees belong to the birch family.
